title: Create a small app like Netflix and Backend (Updated)
desc: Hi, re-posting, we are planning to make an app like Netflix, but not as big as Netflix, just a small app that delivers video contents. We use Wowza service for streaming engine. title: Sweden only!!! -  Testing online services via 3G internet connection (mobile internet).
desc: DetailsUser need to host 19 inch network rack (370 × 570 x 450mm) which is built for testing purposes. It can be held in your flat, garage, bedroom, office whenever suit you and where power supply is stable and internet connection available. Device will be sent to the address who user provides by DHL. User need to accept it and connect it to power supply and internet. Device is complete safe, durability tested, and very few additional work about rack should be done.User has to provide dry closed vented space, stable power supply (220V/16A) and land line internet connection as user need to connect rack on internet router via UTP cable.For our testing purposes, stable upload speed of land line internet connection is important (higher speed is better).User would have to host computer rack on min 1 year.User is required English knowledge on communication level.Upon receipt, user needs to buy new SIM prepaid cards from:1. Telia - 3 sim card, flat internet enabled and activated2. Tele2 - 3 sim card, flat internet enabled and activated3. Telenor - 3 sim card, flat internet enabled and activated4. Three - 3 sim card, flat internet enabled and activatedAccordingly, user will be instructed where to put them.This jobs demands 1 day work upon acceptance of the rack (buying sim cards), further more, there is no additional work required. However, if some device malfunctions, user is required to get in contact and with our tech team, together to solve problem.This is professional network rack and no malfunctions are expected.User is paid 100 $/monthly. For any additional question, please let us know.We are Media Monkeys ltd, software engineering company based in Montenegro, who specialize testing online service across globe. This device helps up testing online services via 3G internet connection (mobile internet).

title: Project for Preeti G.
desc: Hi Preeti G.,

title: Create a iOS app - Social GPS activity tracker
desc: Project deadline 30. august.Need a developer or a team that can support in creating an iOS app. The app will be a cross between an activity tracker (eg. Strava, Runkeeper, Edmondo) and a social platform (chat, likes, comments, profile page), and some custom club management. Will share more info privately. The app will include key elements such as map functionality, gps tracking, share real-time location with selected group/club, social elements (likes, comments, photo sharing), chat and competitive rankings (eg. Number of km walked). Long-term goal is to have an iOS and Android app, with a more comprehensive web solution. But by end-of-august the goal is to have a first MVP for the iOS app with the required back-end services.The developer skills needed:- GPS, activity tracking and map handling- Social elements (chat, likes, comments etc)- Real-time sharing of information between users, using notifications etc- Analytics - Google, A/B testingNeed to show portfolio of iOS app projects that include GPS activity tracking, mapping functionality, social elements and realtime notification and data sharing between users. Develop should also be strong in English.As part of the project the tech stack needs to be chosen and set-up, including back-end provider. I would suggest using similar technology as used for the app Strava(see [url removed, login to view] for info), but open for other suggestions.The app should contain five main sections:- News feed showing activities by other users the person follows- Club find and join “clubs”, and manage your own clubs- Record activity a gps tracker with map, ability to share real-time location with other users on the same activity, ability to share photos geolocation tagged in the map, ability to record geolocation of animal shot and/or seen, and chat functionality within the active hunting group.- Profile - the user profile, selected stats, photos by user, overview of activities, overview of rankings- Chat - General chat functionality, clubs, user created groups and individuals etcThe app should take a lot of inspiration from the app “Strava” for the “news feed”, “Club”, “record activities” and “profile”. But there will obviously be adjustments to tailor it towards a different topic (to be informed privately).  It should be built to be multilingual, but developed in English. The app should be very well documented, so that myself or others are able to take-over the work if required. However main goal is for the developer to supporting over the coming year(s). The app should be built with heavy integration of google analytics, and be prepared to A/B testing etc.I do have an iOS developer account to be used, however everything else needs to be setup. All providers needed for running and operating the app and backend should be created in my name, so to be independent of any chosen developer. Please therefore provide your requirements to third-parties as part of your bid.I aim to run a separate design competition for the look and feel. The developer should therefore plan to work with a third-party designer at some point. However the developer can use the Stava design for the purpose of the MVP (or until new design is chosen).

title: Footbal Header Challenge
desc: Football Header Challenge is a game in hwich a ball bounces in footballer heads, and the only user function is to tilt the phone left and right to make the ball bounce in the nearest head. If the ball misses a head and it falls off the screen, the game is over. To make a fair comparison, the game is almost the same as the popular DoodleJump. There are 2 game modes: free, in which the user tries to score as much headshots as possible, and arcade, in which the user tries to win levels of a defined amount of headshots.

title: Implement a button to open a Live Video Chat, in an existing Android App
desc: 1 Android Application.2 Existing app code is available3 Apps are already live on App Store.4 Download the apps here:4A [url removed, login to view]4B [url removed, login to view]5 What needs to be done:5A. Install the app, go through the app5B. Go to any individual Tutor's individual profile page on the app, such as: "Ngo Wai Koon" or "Joanne Chew"5C. Add a "Start Live Video Chat" button to that profile Screen. When user A presses on Tutor B's (for e.g. Joanne Chew's) "Start Live VIdeo Chat button", it will send a video request. On Tutor B's screen will show a Notification pop-up on the Android phone desktop Home screen. Pressing the notification will bring Tutor B to the App. Inside the App, on Tutor B's phone, it will show the "Start Live Video Chat" button. When B presses it, a LIVE video chat is started between A and B.5D. Timing function: This live video chat will terminate after X mins automatically. For now, X = 30.
